title: [Training] EfficientDet
description: Really good training pipeline for pytorch EfficientDetHi everyone! My name is Alex Shonenkov, I am DL/NLP/CV/TS research engineer. Especially I am in Love with NLP & DL. Recently I have created kernel for this competition about Weighted Boxes Fusion:  WBF approach for ensemble  I hope it is useful for you, my friends! If you didn't read this kernel, don't forget to do it! :) Today I would like to share really good training pipeline for this competition using SOTA EfficientDet: Scalable and Efficient Object Detection
